website_summaries.verdict: The Optoma ML1000P is a typical LED-based, WXGA (1,280-by-800) projector in most ways, but it stands out from the pack by being a little brighter, with a 1,000-lumen rating.
pros: Bright for a portable LED projector
Reads files from microSD cards and USB memory keys
cons: Touchpad controls are hard to use
Showed scaling artifacts (unwanted patterns added to some screens) at its native resolution in our tests

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Rest (Especially for professional environments)
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector! I travel every week for business and require a portable projector to use in case the client/office doesn't have one. Often times we end up using this one over their fancy built in projectors even if they do have one! It is extremely bright! It is so awkward when your clients cant read/see your presentations...I never have to worry about that here. It is a little bigger than most travel projectors, but the quality is totally worth it. I would recommend this to any person/business looking for a quality projector to make their hard work and presentations look awesome in front of the client!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consmer

customer_reviews.title: setup is easy, device is lightweight and the fact that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away at how much they packed into a small package. Image is bright, setup is easy, device is lightweight and the fact that the bulb lasts 20,000 hours is a huge upgrade from my last projector. Really wish there was a zoom so i can resize the image a bit to fit the screen without moving the projector.
customer_reviews.author: Obvious Expectations

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little projector. I have also used the ML500. The brightness of the ML1000 is noticeably better, however, as with any projector, the environment must be dark for the best performance. I'm still adjusting to the trackpad menu interface. I prefer the hard-button access keys of the ML500/etc.
customer_reviews.author: HikingInSierras

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed what this projector can handle I use it all the time for games and tv shows very pleased with it. Takes a couple of seconds start a lot better than my cine-go. The only Cons that it has is the small speaker that it comes with but if you hook up a surround sound system it fixes that problem. Other than that I love it!

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 star but forced to give it a 4
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger/heavier than I expected it and another 'complaint' is the lack of height/angle adjustment and the display output size adjustment. Have to physically move the unit back/front to adjust for the screen display. Gets about as hot as the traditional bulb projector so that was a surprise. Wish I could give it a 3.5 but forced to choose 4.

customer_reviews.title: optoma ml1000 a great projector.
customer_reviews.text: I owned the optoma ml500 and it was great. The optoma ml1000 is twice as bright so I sold the ml500 and bought the 1000. Both look great for gaming and movies although the ml500 had more fine tuning options which I thought was odd. The LED is awesome not having to worry about bulbs. I highly recommend both of these but you should use these in a somewhat dark room.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings, great unit as long as you don't want to use the wireless AND the Internet
customer_reviews.text: It has a couple fans that are a bit noisy in my opinion when the room as quiet, but once the ambient noise came up due to others being in the office it wasn't nearly as noticeable. The unit is nice and lightweight, the auto-keystone works well, the display is bright and sharp from just under 2' to about 13' that I tested (it goes further, I was out of room). A lot of what I project is live demos and no network access while using the wifi is a real deal-breaker for me though, so this is going back.

product_meta.title: Optoma ML1000P WXGA 1000 Lumen LED Projector (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Style:1000 Lumens

OPTOMA ML1000P, WXGA, 1000 LED LUMENS, 3D-READY MOBILE PROJECTOR
View Larger POWERFUL, PORTABLE, UNSURPASSED LED PERFORMANCE
The Optoma ML1000P is designed for mobile professionals seeking a light, compact, fully-featured ultra portable LED projector that is powerful enough to use in the most demanding environments. Its industry leading LED light source delivers 1000 lumens of brightness and a stunning 15,000:1 contrast ratio to produce the richest, most vibrant colors in this product category. The ML1000P provides full comprehensive connectivity so you can use it with all of your existing gear. It also includes an SD card port that allows you to deliver PowerPoint presentations, view PDF documents, display pictures, movies and more without the need of a computer or external device. An innovative touch pad design allows you to easily control the projector and maximize ease of use.

View Larger FEATURES:
 * Perfect for traveling presenters
 * Intuitive touchpad control for ease of operation
 * LED light source lasts for the life of the product
 * HDMI connectivity for maximum compatibility
 * 3D Ready for the most amazing, immersive viewing experience

INCREDIBLE POWER, EFFICIENCY, AND DURABILITY IN A SINGLE SOLUTION
The Optoma ML1000P provides a compact design and vivid LED performance. Designed by the leader in LED-based projection, the ML1000P sets a new standard for brightness at 1000 ANSI Lumens. LED brightness cannot be easily compared to lamp-based brightness. LED brightness lets users create larger images in rooms with more light while still allowing for easy viewing. With a wider color gamut than standard lamp projectors, the ML1000P delivers more vivid colors. Delivering Native WXGA resolution, this projector creates crisp, clear widescreen images of up to 100 inches on most surfaces. This DLP Pico projector allows users to share detailed presentations (with 15,000:1 contrast ratio) without being hooked up to a computer.

Weighing in at just 3 pounds and measuring a compact 10.6 x 1.9 x 6.7, the ML1000P supports the following video signals: HDTV (up to 1080p) NTSC, and PAL. Computer compatibility includes resolutions up to WXGA (1280 x 800) through VGA and HD (1920 x 1080) through HDMI.

LED DESIGN ADVANTAGE
The ML1000P's LED technology delivers low power consumption that creates 100" images with less than half the power a typical 42-inch LCD television uses. The same LED technology provides vivid color, durability and long life that make it attractive to price-sensitive small business and consumer users.

The LED light source has an estimated lifetime of more than 20,000 hours (equivalent to using the projector four hours every day for over thirteen years). LED is incredibly cost effective compared to lamp-based projectors. For example, users with a lamp-based projector would have to replace the lamp in the projector at least four times over 20,000 hours of usage-at a cost of over $800, compared to the completely maintenance-free LED lamp.

The LED-based design, in addition to having low power usage and eliminating use of mercury and other hazardous materials, allows for cool operation which in turn allows for the compact size.

STATE-OF-THE-ART DLP TECHNOLOGY
Projectors with Texas Instrument's DLP with BrilliantColor technology feature multi-color processing to produce accurate and vibrant colors on the screen. The Optoma ML1000P multi-color processing system features an RGB LED light engine with a wide color gamut to achieve superb color saturation and accuracy for extraordinary image quality. In addition, incredibly high native contrast ratios ensure clean and crisp black and white to ensure that text and charts are easy to read.

View Larger GREEN BY DESIGN
The ML1000P has been designed and manufactured to:

 * Use less than one-watt power consumption in standby mode-Up to 75 percent savings compared to regular standby mode
 * Limit energy use, with automatic shut down and remote management and control
 * Employ long-life materials and components
 * Use components that are lead-free on all printed circuit boards
 * Use no polystyrene foam in the packing materials
 * Comply with RoHS standards to phase out the use of hazardous materials

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
This package includes the Optoma ML1000P, WXGA, 1000 LED Lumens Mobile Projector, AC Power Cord, VGA-to-VGA Cable, Carrying Case, Remote Control, Battery for Remote and Quick Start Card.
